title: Ironman Mode/Hardcore ironman firsts

properties.name: description
properties.value: Hardcore ironman mode was released on November 10th of 2016; and this list contains documentation of the first hardcore ironman players to achieve specific goals. All of the first achievements that are listed on Jagex's official website, have been listed here, with the great addition of the first 99s achieved. Moreover, the lists here are sorted by date, while Jagex's aren't.

content:
Hardcore ironman mode was released on November 10th of 2016; and this list contains documentation of the first hardcore ironman players to achieve specific goals. All of the first achievements that are listed on Jagex's official website, have been listed here, with the great addition of the first 99s achieved. Moreover, the lists here are sorted by date, while Jagex's aren't.

Contents

  • 1 Skill mastery
  • 2 Boss kill
  • 3 Boss pet
  • 4 Signature drop
  • 5 Quests
  • 6 Achievement diaries
  • 7 Other

All 99s Guile 12 October 2017

rawContent:
Hardcore ironman mode was released on November 10th of [[2016]]; and this list contains documentation of the '''first [[hardcore ironman]] players to achieve specific goals'''. All of the ''first achievements'' that are listed on [https://www.runescape.com/oldschool/hardcore-firsts Jagex's official website], have been listed here, with the great addition of the first 99s achieved. Moreover, the lists here are sorted by date, while Jagex's aren't.
